description: Hungry folks all over Vermont are just going hog wild over the absolutely delicious award-winning pit-smoked cuisine from Hog Heaven BBQ. Ward Mann has been blazing through BBQ competitions for years, and everyone who has gotten a taste of his incredible food can agree that he deserves every trophy he’s earned. He continues to win over every guest at every event he caters, with his mouthwatering menu that includes…Pit Roasted Whole Hogs, Grilled BBQ Glazed Chicken, Texas Style Smoked Beef Brisket, Succulent Slo-cooked BBQ Roast Beef, Smoked BBQ Pork Ribs, and more.As far as salads and sides, you’ll find everything from Mac ‘n Cheese to Cajun Rice w/ Red Beans. You will just die and go to Hog Heaven when you come by and try this divinely tasty BBQ.
name: Hog Heaven BBQ
